section.para: This screen shows the effects of a simulated BoM.

section.title: The parameters form
section.para: Select the product of the BoM you want to simulate. Choose the BoM-type and set the quantity to simulate.
Set the simulation type and select the warehouse to get the QoH (Quantity on Hand).
Subsequently click the 'Submit'-button to execute the simulation. The output of the simulation is shown below the form.

section.title: The simulation overview
section.para: The simulation will be executed and an overview will be shown after the button has been pressed.
The first section will show the details of the BoM. The second part will show the required quantities and costs of the components.
